/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the cityscape. The street, filled with cars and pedestrians, stretches out below, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly gray and white, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, trees add a touch of green to the urban landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
